comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: Wikipedia on Francis Delafield, a physician who was the "son of the prominent John Delafield who had emigrated to America from London, England in 1783 carrying the provisional peace treaty between England and The United States."

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Since Delafield died in July 1915, this photo may have been supplied by Bain for obituaries. New-York tribune., July 18, 1915, Page 9 has an announcement of his death, but uses a different photo chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030214/1915-07-18/ed-...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: More on Delafield at www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/14733429 Francis Delafield (1841-1915): the original contributions of an American investigator to diseases of the kidney.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for your great research. We'll fill in the caption the next time we update.
